entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:46 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
